p: Viral respiratory infections (VRI) continue to be among the most common human illnesses. Antiviral plants have much to offer for patients with the acute bronchitis, acute respiratory syndrome, common cold, influenza, viral pharyngitis. Among these antiviral plants, there are many plants studied for their activity against respiratory viruses. These herbal medicines have been used to treat viral flu caused by influenza virus ( Choi et al., 2019), human respiratory syncytial viruses (hRSV) ( Shin et al., 2013), and notably during the previous epidemics of this century such as two coronavirus outbreaks (SARS-CoV in 2002 and MERS-CoV in 2012).
